title: Hantec Trader 20%
description: Hantec Trader, based in MU, was established in December 2023. The firm is a CFD provider offering three program types: 1 Step, Instant, and 2 Steps, and it supports the MT5 and MT4 trading platforms. Hantec Trader has a review score of 4.6 out of 5 based on 21 reviews. Verified by our [Intelligence Hub](/) for prop trading excellence.

forbidden_strategies: Overleveraging: Using 85% or more of margin on single asset/related assets.
All or Nothing Trading: Risking entire daily loss limit on a single trade or concurrent trades.
Account Size Restriction: 1 account of each size maximum. Only 1 active Instant Funding account allowed.

payout_policy.processing_time: Every 14 days (Enhanced/Express/Instant/EnhancedX first withdrawal on demand).
payout_policy.details: Profit Lock Rule: Payout locks max loss at starting balance. Instant Lite: First 3% profit is safety buffer/cannot be withdrawn.

firm_rules.expert_advisor: EAs are not allowed in Instant Funding accounts.
firm_rules.inactivity_rule: All accounts deactivated after 30 days of inactivity.
firm_rules.news_trading: Instant Funding: Trades cannot be opened/closed 3 minutes prior to or after high impact news. Allowed in other programs (implied).
firm_rules.weekend_holding: Not allowed in the instant funding program. Allowed in others (implied).
forbidden_strategies: Overleveraging: Using 85% or more of margin on single asset/related assets.
All or Nothing Trading: Risking entire daily loss limit on a single trade or concurrent trades.
Account Size Restriction: 1 account of each size maximum. Only 1 active Instant Funding account allowed.

seo_content:
Hantec Trader Technical Infrastructure

Hantec Trader, based in MU, was established in December 2023. The firm is a CFD provider offering three program types: 1 Step, Instant, and 2 Steps, and it supports the MT5 and MT4 trading platforms. Hantec Trader has a review score of 4.6 out of 5 based on 21 reviews. Verified by our [Intelligence Hub](/) for prop trading excellence.
